snippet: A pepper grinder, with a twist or two, grinds and dispenses red chile flakes or whole dried red chiles.
abstract: Trudeau Red Pepper Mill is able to crush whole red chiles and flakes at the table or in the kitchen, dispensing them easily, and is available online.
lead_paragraph: A pepper grinder, with a twist or two, grinds and dispenses red chile flakes or whole dried red chiles.

headline.seo: A Twist or Two to Finely Ground Chile Flakes
headline.main: A Twist or Two for Finely Ground Chile Flakes
headline.print_headline: A Twist or Two For Finely Ground Chile Flakes
